channel.title: Insulting Canadians
channel.description:
This deserved it's own thread cus Niall fkn nailed da best line of jokes ever:
[code]<Niall> wait isn't rogers a canadian isp? <`Lewk_> yes <Niall> go play hockey with tico <`Lewk_> hockey is for homos <Niall> I think your driveway needs shoveling <`Lewk_> its 114 F outside. <Niall> great weather for maple syrup[/code]
Discuss

item.title: Insulting Canadians
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Bowser jr:

why don’t Americans move to Canada?

Because we don’t want our country filled with idiots who will cause our HDI to go down.

Read full topic

item.title: Insulting Canadians
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You know Canada is the 2. best country to live in: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_Human_Development_Index

It is richer, better and don’t have stupid presidents, why don’t Americans move to Canada?

Read full topic

item.title: Insulting Canadians
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

la­wl:

i was right in the middle of the thunderstorm, and i didnt lose power

I was also right in the middle of the thunderstorm…
The thunder was so loud at one point it actually pushed the rain towards me. Epic.

Read full topic

item.title: Insulting Canadians
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:14, topic:294121”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=389032.msg2907434#msg2907434 date=1249874721]

[quote author=Tico link=topic=389032.msg2907421#msg2907421 date=1249874277]

on a side note, it was very humid today.
[/quote]we had tornado warnings and there was massive lightning throughout the sky constantly :S

and a tree branch fell in the middle of the street near my house and it takes up more than half the street >.>

Yeah, the lightning storm was actually pretty epic to watch; except for the fact my power went out twice, one of which happened when I was in a Nazi Zombie game.
[/quote]my cable went out and my water isn’t running through the sinks :S

Sucker. Na, we can get it just as bad here at times. When we had floods a few years back some people went without electricity for up to a week.
Our government sucks.[/quote]
well fuck ya’ll we never get anything like that, the only plus about english weather

Read full topic

item.description:

runescape3dude:

Was this thread somehow spawned through Marijuana?

item.title: Insulting Canadians
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You know that these two nations are at war for a few acres of snow, and they are spending… more than all of Canada is worth
Voltaire

It makes little difference, Canada is useful only to provide me with furs
Madame de Pompadour

I fear that I have not got much to say about Canada, not having seen much, what I got by going to Canada was a cold.
Henry Thoreau

I don’t even know what street Canada is on
Al Capone

Canada has a climate nine months winter and three months late in the fall
American saying

A sub-artic lumber village converted by Royal Mandate into a political cock fighting pit
Goldwin Smith on Ottawa

I find that Newfoundland is said to be celebrated for it’s codfish, its dogs, its hogs and its fogs
Sir William Whiteway

The purity of the air of Newfoundland is without doubt due to the fact that the people never open their windows
JG Millais

Quebec does not have opinions, only sentiments
HL Mencken

Montreal is the only place where a good French accent isn’t a social assett
Brendan Behan

Toronto as a city carries out the idea of Canada as a country. It is a calculated crime both against the aspirations of the soul and the affection of the heart
Aleister Crowley

The cold narrow minds, the confined ideas, the by-gone prejudices of the society are hardly conceivable; books there are none, nor music, and as to pictures! the Lord deliver us from such! The people do not know what a picture is.
Anna Jameson, Canadian writer

How utterly destitute of all light and charm are the intellectual conditions of our people and the institutions of our public life! How barbarous!
Archibald Lampman, Canadian writer

Canada is useful only to provide me with furs.
Madame de Pompadour, French socialite, after the fall of Quebec, 1759

This gloomy region, where the year is divided into one day and one night, lies entirely outside the stream of history.
W. W. Reade, British explorer and novelist, 1872

Read full topic

item.title: Insulting Canadians
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:13, topic:294121”][quote author=Tico link=topic=389032.msg2907421#msg2907421 date=1249874277]

[quote author=Uriko link=topic=389032.msg2907411#msg2907411 date=1249873844]

on a side note, it was very humid today.
[/quote]we had tornado warnings and there was massive lightning throughout the sky constantly :S

and a tree branch fell in the middle of the street near my house and it takes up more than half the street >.>

Yeah, the lightning storm was actually pretty epic to watch; except for the fact my power went out twice, one of which happened when I was in a Nazi Zombie game.
[/quote]my cable went out and my water isn’t running through the sinks :S[/quote]
Sucker. Na, we can get it just as bad here at times. When we had floods a few years back some people went without electricity for up to a week.
Our government sucks.

Read full topic

item.title: Insulting Canadians
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:7, topic:294121”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=389032.msg2907367#msg2907367 date=1249871888]

how does weather influence eating maple syrup?

Weather is a crucial factor in the production of maple syrup, with producers getting their best yields when warm, sunny days follow freezing nights

clearly your quote is irrelevent because production is not related to eating
[/quote]unless you are sucking it from the tree

That’s sap. Which can actually taste good from some maple trees. Maple syrup is boiled down sap.[/quote]

your taste has been numbed by drugs, how would you know?

Read full topic

Weather is a crucial factor in the production of maple syrup, with producers getting their best yields when warm, sunny days follow freezing nights
